title: GrocerEase
description: An e-commerce website for grocery shopping, offering a common platform for both buyers and sellers.

title: Racing In IUT
description: A skeleton of a single-player game where the player races against himself using a time tracker.

title: Cheems
description: A server-based meme-sharing platform designed for creating, viewing, engaging with, and enjoying funny content.

title: Bangla Movie Popularity Predictor
description: A Machine Learning project to predict the IMDb average rating of Bangla movies.

title: Bon Voyage!
description: A website centered around Bangladesh that will assist people to plan a trip according to their preferences.

title: Find-A-Doc
description: A PHP-based website designed to schedule patient appointments with doctors..

title: RRF: Rate. Review. Find.
description: A PHP-based website designed to schedule patient appointments with doctors.

title: Bug Severity Prediction
description: A deep-learning LSTM model implementation to predict bug severity.
